review: Doctor is very good listener, he listen and understand issues and then suggest the best things. Very genuine person when guiding about issues. He gives proper time to patients.

My experience with Dr Anil Sabharwal is very good. He is very polite and caring doctor. He listened our problems with very detailed. He told us very detailed about disease and told about diagnosis also. He is so helpfull and good in nature. I recommend this doctor for children.
Accute abdomen pain around the navel area in a pulsating mode with vomiting from 2 days, now it seems that she will be ok.
Very satisfying and good advice given by the doctor i recommend to all my friends who want good consultation

review: He's friendly. He examimed and well analyzed the issue. Experienced and professional. This was the first time i consulted him and i was satisfied.
Doctor was friendly and explained the issue in detail. He was detailed *** ********* in treatment, he took right amount of time to diagnose and heard all concern.
****** ** **** **** *** provide very clear diagnosis. I would recommend the same kids to other parents.

Sir is humble and a good listener. He will talk to you with best of the efforts and made you comfortable with his loads n heaps of experience.
I went there for vaccination for my child.
Overall a very good experience.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words.
